title: Publications
text:
Enumeration of regular fractional factorial designs with four-level and two-level factorsBohyn Alexandre, Schoen Eric & Goos Peter





 Published in Journal of the Royal Statistical Society: Series C, 2023
In this paper, we present an efficient method to enumerate regular designs with both four-level factors and two-level factors. We then use this method to generate a catalog of all such designs with up to three four-level factors, 20 two-level factors, and 128 runs. Finally, we revisit several examples from the literature where our catalog could have been useful.
Recommended citation: Bohyn A., Schoen E., Goos P. (2023). ‚ÄúEnumeration of regular fractional factorial designs with four-level and two-level factors‚Äù. Journal of the Royal Statistical Society: Series C.









Design and analysis of a microplate assay in the presence of multiple restrictions on the randomizationAlexandre Bohyn, Eric D. Schoen, Chee Ping Ng, Kristina Bishard, Manon Haarmans, Sebastian J. Trietsch & Peter Goos





 Under review in Journal of Agricultural, Biological, and Environmental Statistics
Recommended citation: Bohyn A., Schoen E., Ng C., Bishard K., Haarmans M., Trietsch S., Goos P. (2023). ‚ÄúDesign and analysis of a microplate assay in the presence of multiple restrictions on the randomization‚Äù. Journal of Agricultural, Biological, and Environmental Statistics. Manuscript Under Review.

title: Alexandre Bohyn
text: After graduating from UCLouvain in Soil and Water management, I developed an interest for statistics than led me to do a master in Statistics in KU Leuven. There, I met Peter Goos who became my Ph.D.¬†promoter. I am now studying design of experiments and their applications to robustify protocol for cell-based bio-assays. I am currently working on the enumeration and characterization of large regular mixed-level designs.
